compiler

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Binary, Id, Number, Unary

    abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract node for a DAG. Other node types inherit.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int id
      Unique identifier for this node.
      private static int lastId
      The last-used node id.
      (package private) int parentCount
      Count of parents of this node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node()
      Construct a new node with unique ID number.

      Return true iff this node should be subject to common subexpression analysis.

      Set the parent count field of the DAG rooted at this node.

      Set the parent count field.
      (package private) abstract java.lang.String emitCode(CodeGenerator ctx)
      Append new statements to the context as needed and return a target language expression for the value of this node.

      Return a temporary variable name for this node.

        Returns:

      • countParents

        Node countParents()
        Set the parent count field of the DAG rooted at this node. Call only once! (Currently in the parser.)

        Returns:
